articles.title: Esther Dingley's boyfriend shares their final words to each other as he launches campaign - The Mirror
articles.description: Esther Dingley's boyfriend Daniel Colegate says he hopes in time he can take comfort from his final talk with his beloved girlfriend, who was found dead after going missing in Europe's Pyrenees
articles.content:
Hiker Esther Dingley's boyfriend has revealed the couple's final words to one another as he launches a fundraiser in her honour.
Daniel Colegate found his girlfriend's body last week after a long an… [+4609 chars]

articles.title: Inside the crimes of Gerry 'The Monk' Hutch as mob boss arrested after European manhunt - Irish Mirror
articles.description: The fallen gang boss will almost certainly be sent home to face trial for allegedly masterminding the Regency Hotel attack
articles.content:
From running a teenage gang, Gerry Hutch became one of the wealthiest criminals in the State, suspected of masterminding a series of bank robberies.
